org.sadun.util.cache2
Class CacheExpirationState

java.lang.Object
  org.sadun.util.cache2.CacheExpirationState
Direct Known Subclasses:
TimeExpirationController.TimeExpirationState
public class CacheExpirationState
extends java.lang.Object

A class embedding the minimum amount of information about the expiration state of an item in a Cache, namely the fact that has expired or not according to the cache's expiration controller.

Author:
Cristiano Sadun
